title: Vishwanath temple-Gyanvapi mosque: Below the surface in eternal city, layers of a simmering faultline - The Indian Express
content: Vishwanath temple-Gyanvapi mosque: Below the surface in eternal city, layers of a simmering faultline  The Indian Express
description: In election season, politics over the Vishwanath temple-Gyanvapi mosque dispute flares up, evoking disquiet as well as glee among Varanasi residents.
